code:
import Test from'@/components/test';import Login from'@/views/Login';import Main from'@/views/Main';import Contact from'@/views/user/Contact';/**
 * 路由表
 * @param {*} path:地址
 * @param {*} name:名称
 * @param {*} component:组件
 * @param {*} loginFlag:是否需要登录,登录标识
 */var routerMap=[{path:'/',name:'测试',component:Test,loginFlag:true,exact:true,back:false},{path:'/login',name:'登录',component:Login,loginFlag:false,exact:true,back:false},{path:'/main/:type',name:'主要的',component:Main,loginFlag:true,exact:false,back:false},{path:'/user/contact',name:'联系客服',component:Contact,loginFlag:true,exact:true,back:true}];export var routerMatch=function routerMatch(path){var pathArr=path.split('/');var regexp=/^:\w+/i;var matchRes=routerMap.find(function(res){var itemArr=res.path.split('/');itemArr.forEach(function(str,index){if(regexp.test(str)){itemArr[index]=pathArr[index];}});if(JSON.stringify(itemArr)===JSON.stringify(pathArr)){return res;}else{return false;}});if(matchRes){return matchRes;}else{return null;}};export default routerMap;
